alert.note: Alert for Southern Somerset (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 15 at 3:28AM EST until January 17 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible on Monday with 6 or more inches possible. * WHERE...Southern Somerset County. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, until 1 PM EST this afternoon. For the Winter Storm Watch, from late Sunday night through Monday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult Monday. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
